name: web-extension
description: A sample web extension using Glean.js

scripts.glean: glean translate src/metrics.yaml src/pings.yaml -f typescript -o src/generated
scripts.build: npm run glean && webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode production
scripts.dev: npm run glean && webpack --watch --config webpack.config.js --mode development
